original_title: Fuel Quota to increase from June
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka's Minister of Power and Energy said that the Fuel Quota currently allowed on the National Fuel Pass QR system will be increased from the next months fuel price revision.
He tweeted that the decision was taken at the meeting held with the CPC finance, commercial & marketing divisions.
One million eggs to be imported daily, says Sri Lanka State Trading (General) Corporation
23 people gunned down in Sri Lanka in 2023; 239 murders in 146 days this year
